subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] evp
author: Amy Swanson
full_text:
--0-1114387750-1150228516=:17999
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

well your right, its not that i havent payed attention per say, more taht i refused to see them, hear them, feel them <except those few that really push the limits come through anyway! lol <like the mean one that lived in my closet>
  I was reading about "signs" of entities around you and happenings  and it seems that i have been a hotel and hitchhiker picker upper ROFL all my life for them, I have just ignored them forever. Now i have wanted to see hear and talk to them but i dont feel very successfull, but then im NOT a patient person lol
   
  Amy

Jody Cupp <bigrig309@...> wrote:
            For me Amy, it's been about establishing a relationship with those I can not always see.
   
  I differ with your point of view about a door being open or closed. Unless you take it as you're starting to pay attention more to your surroundings, in my oppinion they are always there, always have been, but you didn't take notice.  Once you start to take notice, ask them for help etc, then the evps and answers to your questions will come.  I also suspect that there is a building type situation going on that would make it easier for them to communicate with you. I have seen the ecto in the shape of horns going into my computer, which is substancial to me when the voices change.  It's all about energy.  We are energy they are energy everything in this world is energy, we just need to learn to harness it and use it to get what we want.  look around your home.  do you see horizontal lights? do you see orbs? if not thats okay, it will happen as you learn to notice things that you've been too busy to see.
   
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Amy Swanson 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2006 3:35 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] evp
  

      well if yall are very expiereinced in this, i just started doing evp's a few weeks ago!
  I know that these folks have been around me and some are where i live. the first time i did an evp i got nothing till the 3rd time. Then its seems that it opened a door for them, they are conversing amongst themselves saying hello to each other, that they can see, they can see the computer, one of them said he was beseiged. I didnt record again till yesterday, and i kinda wonder if they are mad? i kept getting vibes to record but have been to tired with moving. Can they get mad with you? i assume they can. When i recorded, i have been using microsoft word and typing my questions, and a little bit of talking too, if they can see the computer <so they said> why not?! I also used this thing from EVP maker that shows pictures and makes clicks and tones. The only thing they had to say was "watch" watch", wether they ment to not say anything and just watch m e or refering to some of the questions i had, i dont know, cant assume anything lol. What can i do to get them to talk to
 me more? Answer questions? like no one has indentified themselves and i would really like to know who they are. I have a few people i would like to talk to that have passed over. However anyone is nice lol. I just would like to open this door MORE now, that i have closed off. I think that I opened a doorway for them but i want to interact more! People have been refering to me as a "sensitive"? I assume meaning that i am able to tell if they are here etc. Which i usually can. Is it possible that because in the past for the most part i have kept this part of me closed off, except those entities that refuse to be silenced come through, that they are skeptical of talking to me? That i cant handle it?
   
  Anyway, justthought id talk with somemore people who have "been there done that"
  I would like to have someone over who has alot of history and do an evp in my home and talk to them for me. <sigs>
   
  Amy
   


  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/
   
  LON3_S7AR  YAHOO MESENGER ID
